backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing public message submissions with admin-protected retrieval and deletion plus user profile storage with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing admin message formatting, toggling, field extraction, and i18n updates with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file summaries describing routing, components, styling, i18n, storage, and utility modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML root document loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React routing setup defining all app routes and onboarding logic wrapped in AppShell and I18nProvider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMessa: Admin UI component rendering message JSON with formatted and raw toggle, field categorization, and i18n labels.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24Car: Reusable styled card wrapper with optional click interaction.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24For: Reusable form field wrapper showing label, helper text, and error display.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactV: Dialog form for contacting a worker via Work24 with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/contact/Work24Of: Dialog showing official Work24 phone and email contacts with a close button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer displaying contact details, service info, quick links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation links, language switcher, mobile menu, and optional admin link.
Layout wrapper rendering header, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/materials/Materi: Card showing sanitized material details, image, description, and a contact button.
frontend/src/components/settings/Languag: Dropdown menu to switch the app's language using i18n context.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Card displaying sanitized worker info, gallery with image preview dialog, and contact button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and deleting admin messages via the actor and session data.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements a context provider for language selection and translations, persisting language in local preferences.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and nested translation strings for the app UI.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, CSS variables for theming, and global typography settings.
frontend/src/lib/adminAllowlist.ts: Deprecated admin allowlist utilities replaced by the new session-based authentication model.
Utility functions for parsing, categorizing, and formatting admin message JSON fields.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Manages admin login credentials using sessionStorage with helpers to set, get, and clear sessions.
frontend/src/lib/contactSubmissions.ts: Provides a mutation hook to submit contact requests by sending formatted messages to the backend.
frontend/src/lib/formatIcTime.ts: Converts IC bigint nanosecond timestamps into humanâ€‘readable date strings.
frontend/src/lib/localPreferences.ts: Handles onboarding, username, and language persistence using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/materialsStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves materials from localStorage and generates IDs for new materials.
frontend/src/lib/officialContact.ts: Exports static official contact details and preformatted links for phone and email.
Sanitizes worker and material objects by whitelisting allowed safe fields.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Defines the list of service categories with IDs, translation keys, and icons.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides basic form validation helpers for required fields and mobile numbers.
frontend/src/lib/workersStorage.ts: Handles worker storage in localStorage, including lookup by service and ID generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin page with login handling, message fetching, and delete actions using React Query and session storage.
frontend/src/pages/Architect.tsx: Architect inquiry form that validates inputs, handles file uploads, and submits project details.
frontend/src/pages/Career.tsx: Career application form collecting candidate info, validating fields, and sending submissions.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUs.tsx: Static contact page showing phone, email, service info, and localization support.
frontend/src/pages/HomeServices.tsx: Home page displaying hero content and a grid of navigable service cards.
frontend/src/pages/Materials.tsx: Materials listing page rendering stored materials and showing a contact panel.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Onboarding flow to collect user name and language preference, storing it and navigating home.
frontend/src/pages/SellerMaterialSubmiss: Form page allowing sellers to submit material info with validation, image upload, and storage via addMaterial.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Displays details for a service and lists related workers, with a dialog for contacting a selected worker.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerSubmission.tsx: Form for workers to submit profiles including skills, images, and service category, validating inputs and storing via addWorker.
frontend/src/types/materials.ts: Defines the Material interface with id, metadata fields, and image list.
frontend/src/types/workers.ts: Defines the Worker interface including skill, service category, images, and optional location.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing and pending features for the Work24 Admin Dashboard.
